email.title: Citadel Information & Networking Session
email.text:
# Know No Limits
Face some of the most complex challenges of our time and test the limits of your talents alongside highly skilled teammates. We give you more responsibility and back you with greater resources than other firms because we realize your potential for greatness.
Citadel are holding an Imperial Information & Networking Session on October 14 at 6:15â€”8:00 PM. You can find more details in the attached pdf.
